amendment.description: To strike the retroactive effective date.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5096 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5096 proposed by Senator Hassan for Senator Lee. (consideration: CR S2935; text: CR S2945) To strike the retroactive effective date.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5096 proposed by Senator Hassan for Senator Lee.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5096 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
